project.name: |-- 014-custom-collectors
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Collectors
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
ToListCollectorRunner: Illustrates how to implement a custom ToListCollector and how to use the overloaded collect method that accepts the three functions that make the collector.
SpecializedPrimeNumberGeneratorRunner: Illustrates how to implement a custom Collector to provide a very efficient implementation of a prime number generator.
